CustomField.description: The corresponding currency code, ONLY used to assist in batch creation of the index records. NOTE: When using a "Master Price List" this value will be set to GLOBAL, and be currency agnostic.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The corresponding currency code, ONLY used to assist in batch creation of the index records. NOTE: When using a "Master Price List" this value will be set to GLOBAL, and be currency agnostic.
CustomField.label: Index Currency
